Skoop Website

While working with the Human Design team we created a new website and seller portal for a health shake called Skoop. The Boulder-based company, founded by Alex Bogusky, makes a shake mix sold by individual resellers around the nation.

After working with the design team on the site, I then joined the development team to build it.
